WorkItem.Description: The datasource references the function EventTitleByIDSP which returns a string not a dataset.
WorkItem.Summary: Download management in Events is broken

Comments.Message: Further investigation and conparison with News/Downloads show there apear to be 2 problems1) The title of the event is handled by a repeater rather than a label2) The dataview has paging enabled

More investigation1) The code that shows the event title does not work (I don't know why) but replacing it with an asp:label whose text is set at page load does work (as in News/download.aspx)2) In download.ashx the = after eventid needs to be encoded as =3D otherwise some event ids are interpreted as control chars.
Also there is no way to view an event attachment. The code in News?View need to be copied across to Events/View
I have the same issue - even which grabbing the files from the latest Change Set.
